args.natural_language_statement: Let X be a metric space such that every open cover of X has a finite subcover. Prove that every sequence in X has a convergent subsequence. Translate to Lean4: state that for a metric space X with CompactSpace X, for every sequence u : ‚Ñï ‚Üí X there exists a strictly increasing œÜ : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñï and x : X such that u ‚àò œÜ tends to x (with respect to at_top and ùìù x). End the Lean statement with := by sorry. Import Mathlib at the top.

/-- Let X be a metric space such that every open cover of X has a finite subcover. Prove that every sequence in X has a convergent subsequence. Translate to Lean4: state that for a metric space X with CompactSpace X, for every sequence u : ‚Ñï ‚Üí X there exists a strictly increasing œÜ : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñï and x : X such that u ‚àò œÜ tends to x (

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- If X is a compact metric space then every sequence has a convergent subsequence. -/
theorem compact_space.tendsto_subseq_of_compact {X : Type _} [MetricSpace X] [CompactSpace X] (u : ‚Ñï ‚Üí X) :
  ‚àÉ œÜ : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñï, StrictMono œÜ ‚àß ‚àÉ x : X, Tendsto (u ‚àò œÜ) atTop (ùìù x) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- If X is a compact metric space then every sequence has a convergent subsequence. -/
theorem tendsto_subseq_of_compact_space {X : Type _} [MetricSpace X] [CompactSpace X] (u : ‚Ñï ‚Üí X) :
  ‚àÉ œÜ : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñï, StrictMono œÜ ‚àß ‚àÉ x : X, Filter.Tendsto (u ‚àò œÜ) Filter.atTop (nhds x) := by sorry
